product_description: An ultrafeminine cut that starts slim then flares into a swingy finish updates a denim skirt with a soft, lived-in look and feel.
product_details_and_care:
An ultrafeminine cut that starts slim then flares into a swingy finish updates a denim skirt with a soft, lived-in look and feel.
28" length
Zip fly with button closure
Front scoop pockets; back patch pockets
Unlined
89% cotton, 10% polyester, 1% spandex
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
